parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_LastDataDownlinkRate
parameter.description: The data transmit rate in {{units}} that was most recently used for transmission from the access point to the associated device. (Taken from tr-181-2-0).

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_LastDataUplinkRate
parameter.description: The data transmit rate in {{units}} that was most recently used for transmission from the associated device to the access point. (Taken from tr-181-2-0).

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_Active
parameter.description: Whether or not this node is currently present in the WiFi AccessPoint network. The ability to list inactive nodes is OPTIONAL. If the CPE includes inactive nodes in this table, {{param}} MUST be set to {{false}} for each inactive node. The length of time an inactive node remains listed in this table is a local matter to the CPE. (Taken from tr-181-2-0).
